version_description:
New 'onboarding' flow
Personal statistics
Upload custom cover-photos
Possibility to change date of story

... and in general an enhanced user experience
New ability to sign up with custom email and password. Also includes all round valuable bugfixes and enhancements.

We've added a beautiful morning view, to help you start your day on an awesome, positive note!
Also includes all round small optimisations and enhancements.

We've added a beautiful morning view, to help you start your day on an awesome, positive note!
Also includes all round small optimisations and enhancements.

We've added a beautiful morning view, to help you start your day on an awesome, positive note!
Also includes all round small optimisations and enhancements.

We've redesigned the way you create your daily stories for a much more smooth and delightful experience. Reflectly now also helps you to write your journal with only a few clicks and swipes!

This version also includes some overall minor bug fixes, enhancements to the app's speed and graphical improvements.

New updates, ahoy!

- This update includes some minor UI improvements and changes.
- Also includes improvements for performance and fixes a few pesky little bugs.

Tell us what you think of Reflectly by leaving a review! :)

- This update includes some minor UI improvements and changes.
- Also includes improvements for performance and fixes a few pesky little bugs.

Tell us what you think of Reflectly by leaving a review! :)

We've redesigned the way you create your daily stories for a much more smooth and delightful experience. Reflectly now also helps you to write your journal with only a few clicks and swipes!

This version also includes some overall minor bug fixes, enhancements to the app's speed and graphical improvements.

We've redesigned the way you create your daily stories for a much more smooth and delightful experience. Reflectly now also helps you to write your journal with only a few clicks and swipes!

This version also includes some overall minor bug fixes, enhancements to the app's speed and graphical improvements.

Reflectly v2.0 is here! Our biggest update ever:

- We've teamed up with some of the leading self-care and mental health experts to bring you "Audio Reflections". They're little golden nuggets of knowledge that prompt the reflection process and give a little perspective on the larger picture in life. You can unlock a completely new one every day, at the end of each story you create. Try it completely for free with our 7-day free trial - cancel at any time if you're not digging the content! :)

- We've also added the ability to lock your app with a Biometric Lock!

- Oh, did we mention color themes? We've also included 6 beautiful themes for you to customize your Reflectly experience, which we'll continue adding on.

Tell us what you think by leaving a review! :)

Huge update, ahoy!

After working closely with our amazing users and listening to all your feedback, we're now shipping the biggest update ever to Reflectly!

This update contains:

- An entirely new way to journal, revolving around a timeline of your life
- Daily reflections: gain some perspective on life with a new curated question every day
- Add multiple entries per day - any time you want
- Select as many activities and feelings as you wish with your journal entries
- New statistics graphs to better help you understand how you're feeling
- Upload images directly to your timeline
- A greatly improved offline experience
... and much, much more!

This is just the beginning - we have so many great features to come very soon.

We hope you love these new additions to Reflectly. Tell us what you think by leaving a review! :)

We hope you love these new additions to Reflectly. Tell us what you think by leaving a review! :)

Huge update, ahoy!

After working closely with our amazing users and listening to all your feedback, we're now shipping the biggest update ever to Reflectly!

This update contains:

- An entirely new way to journal, revolving around a timeline of your life
- Daily reflections: gain some perspective on life with a new curated question every day
- Add multiple entries per day - any time you want
- Select as many activities and feelings as you wish with your journal entries
- New statistics graphs to better help you understand how you're feeling
- Upload images directly to your timeline
- A greatly improved offline experience
... and much, much more!

This is just the beginning - we have so many great features to come very soon.

We hope you love these new additions to Reflectly. Tell us what you think by leaving a review! :)

Update, ahoy!

This update allows you to set up powerful motivational reminders. Here, Reflectly will send you small pieces of content throughout your day to boost your energy and keep you inspired. Find it by looking under the motivational content tab!

We hope you love these new additions to Reflectly. Tell us what you think by leaving a review! :)

Huge update, ahoy!

We've created the "Reflectly Motivation Widget" that gives you unlimited powerful motivational quotes right on your iPhone home screen!
Quotes change every 5-minutes on their own - so you always have some new inspirational content every time you unlock your phone.

We hope you're loving Reflectly. Tell us what you think by leaving a review! :)
